_header: As I me rode in a May morning
Subjects: carols, satirical; chansons d’aventure; birds, as narrators; contemporary conditions
_description: On contemporary conditions — eleven quatrains with refrain, ‘quod omnis caro fenum est’, and burden: ‘Man in þi mynd loket þis be best / Omnis caro fenum est’

NLS1931.First Lines:
As I me rode in a mey mornyngI loked abowte bothe est &
                    west…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…ffor all þis whord a a weylys noghtquod omnis carnem
                        fenum est
